#include "iostream"
#include "cstdio"
#include "algorithm"
#define n a.length()

using namespace std;

/*void fastIN(long long &a)
{
	char c;
	for(c = getchar_unlocked() ; !(c>='0' && c<= '9') ; c = getchar_unlocked());
	a = c - '0';
	for(c = getchar_unlocked() ; (c>='0' && c<= '9') ; c = getchar_unlocked())
	{
		a*=10;
		a+=c-'0';
	}
}*/

void fastIN(string &a)
{
	char c;
	for(c = getchar() ; !(c>='a' && c<= 'z') ; c = getchar());
	a = c;
	for(c = getchar() ; (c>='a' && c<= 'z') ; c = getchar())
	{
		a.push_back(c);
	}
}


int main()
{
	string a,b;
	cin >> a;
	for(int i=0 ; i<n ; i++)
	{
		if(a[i]+3 > 'Z')
			a[i] = 3 - ('Z' - a[i]) + 'A' - 1;
		else
			a[i] = a[i] + 3;
	}
	cout << a << endl;
}
